original_text: The jar of flour was not spent, neither did the jug of oil become empty, according to the word of the Lord that he spoke by Elijah.
korean_text: 여호와께서 엘리야를 통하여 하신 말씀 같이 통의 가루가 떨어지지 아니하고 병의 기름이 없어지지 아니하니라

sentences.original_text: The jar of flour was not spent
neither did the jug of oil become empty
according to the word of the Lord
